body.p:
Marion Ky Oct 19th 1863
Govenor Bramlet
Dr Sir

I send you writs against Reddick Nichol he is indicted here for horsestealing and I am his bail he joined the Guerrillas here and went off= was captured and sent a prisoner to Fort Delaware and was there a short time since he is a dirty Scamp and I desire that you should demand him as a fugative from Justice in Ky and have him returned if possible here for trial

I am Sir your obt servt
Manering Lowery
